Name: CBS: Desolation
About the game: Build, defend your sanctum, gather resources and survive in this post apocalyptic simulated survivor. Features: Build your sanctum from scratch, start with little water and other resources Gather resources, run scouting and otherwise expeditions to nearing zones Build, upgrade your shelter, house migrating survivors of the disasters Build an inventory, upgrade and enhance your population with crafted items Select one of 4 paragon types, bringing bonuses to your settlement House select paragons to further upgrade your settlement and enhance your population for further success Perform and defend raids in simulated single-player environment Perform other encounters and trade with nearing settlements Play through a refined story that composes your own settlement Skirmish through your best settlement possible by the 100th day.
Meta Title: CBS: Desolation: Feb 19, 2022, Sim-plistic and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on CBS: Desolation? Check out the release date (Feb 19, 2022), developer insights from Sim-plistic, and a complete game summary.
